title: Can Quantum mechanics challenge Einstein’s special relativity? - Quora

response.answer_text: Great physics minds have been working on fixing this problem for the best part of a century. So far the magic eight ball says:  (Unattributed image from the internet). Relativity v quantum mechanics – the battle for the universe

They aren’t competing theories as they apply to different scales. If you’re interested in learning a little about what they are, here are a couple of relatively short wikis: Theory of relativity - Wikipedia Quantum mechanics - Wikipedia
